Location
Singapore, East
Planning Area
CHANGI
Job Type
Full Time
Salary
$4,000 - $5,000 Per Month
Date Posted
6 days ago
Expiry Date
02-Sep-2022
Additional Details
Job ID
340017
Job Views
186
Job Description
Roles & Responsibilities
Job Description
As mobile application developer, you will be responsible for the following:
Developing and deliver iOS applications and it’s features using Swift and MVVM architecture design pattern.
Managing 3rd party open source libraries and versioning using Cocoapods.
Maintaining quality of current code base through unit testing and assisting in regression testing.
Facilitate the troubleshooting and resolving of pre and post-production issues such as provide hotfixes whenever bugs are discovered.
Maintaining technical documentations of iOS development.
Maintaining integrity of current git flow of current git repos.
Assist and advise on UI/UX design capabilities and improvements, feasibility of new functionalities through capabilities of current iOS technology.
Participating in Sprint meetings such as planning and review meetings.
Keep abreast of the latest in mobile technology and conduct research and prototyping using such technologies.
This is a hands-on software development position in which you will be a senior developer working in a small team and collaborating with remote teams.
The ideal candidate is flexible, self-motivated, a great collaborator and works effectively with all disciplines of the team.
We value passion, creativity, responsibility, accountability and top notch engineering practices.
Requirements
Experienced with Swift language and Swift Standard Library.
Experienced with MVC/MVVM architecture.
Experienced with unit testing.
Experienced with using Storyboards, XIBs and programmatic UI.
Knowledgeable using Cocoapods.
Familiar with Git Flow and Agile methodology.
Knowledgeable in handling Apple Developer account, Apple iTunes account and building archives for submission to App Store.
Strong understanding in basic programming concepts such as modularity, retain cycles as how to avoid it for iOS development and delegate, notification and observation patterns.
Basic understanding in Big O notation and their respective time-space complexity.
Inquisitive nature and willing to learn and able to work both independently as well as within a team in a fast phase environment. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Familiar with CI/CD and fastlane will be an added advantage
Familiar with Postman , basic AWS services and using bundler for managing ruby gems will be an added advantage
Having initiative to share and recommend best practices and new technology.
Excellent interpersonal skills including verbal and written communication skill.
Apply via the following link:
https://www.flyscoot.com/en/job-detail?job=R0002151

Job brief
We are looking for a .NET developer to capable of handling many aspects of the application, including but not limited to performance, scalability, security, and testing.
use .NET to build a highly distributed web application, a sophisticated desktop application, or even a modern mobile application.
Ultimately, work with various IT teams to ensure project deliverable to clients.
Preferred qualifications:
Familiarity with the ASP.NET framework, SQL Server and design/architectural patterns (e.g. Model-View-Controller (MVC)
5 years of development experience using C# .NET
Knowledge of at least one of the .NET languages (e.g. C#, Visual Basic .NET) and HTML5/CSS3
Familiarity with architecture styles/APIs (REST, RPC)
Understanding of Agile methodologies
Strong attention to detail
Excellent troubleshooting and communication skills
Knowledge of REST and RPC APIs
Able to work well in a team setting
Responsibilities
Write clean, scalable code using .NET programming languages
Remain up to date with the terminology, concepts and best practices for coding mobile apps
Develop technical interfaces, specifications, and architecture
Use and adapt existing web applications for apps
Create and test software prototypes
Develop client displays and user interfaces
Assist software personnel in handling project related work and other requirements
Coordinate with other software professionals and developers Job brief

The candidate should be able to
Create a suitable color scheme or incorporate the client’s color scheme into the design
Coding the site’s navigation
Design buttons and other controls for the site
Create mock-ups of the site or related graphics for the client’s approval on both laptop and mobile devices
Fix any functionality issues, including the removal of “dead links”
Update and maintain the site with backups

Qualifications

The candidate should have
At least a diploma in Marketing Media or equivalents with 3 years of relevant experience
Knowledge of Search Engine Optimisation
Ability to multitask with strict time constraints, budgets, and business goals
Strong communication skills

Full Time
Job Engagement
Temp
Job Type
The Role
You will be responsible for :
Design and build applications for IOS or Android app.
Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of the application.
Collaborate with a team to define, design, and ship new features.
Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs.
Help maintain code quality, organization, and automatization.
Have a lot of fun and get exposed to real projects.
Ideal Profile
Java & Kotlin for Android, mySQL.
Swift & Objective-C for IOS, frameworks such as Core Data, Core Animation
Familiarity with RESTful APIs to connect IOS/Android applications to back-end services
Knowledge of other web technologies and UI/UX standards
Knowledge of IOS/Android UI design principles, patterns, and best practices
Knowledge of the open-source IOS/Android ecosystem and the libraries available for common tasks.
Passion and a knack for independently solving code challenges.
A lifelong learner who never stops pushing for new knowledge.
Excellent communication competencies (Oral & Written)
Good team player, self-motivated and can-do-attitude.
Stipend: $1,000 per month
What's on Offer?
Work alongside & learn from best in class talent
Excellent career development opportunities
Great work environment Full Time

Design and build applications for IOS or Android app.
Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of the application.
Collaborate with a team to define, design, and ship new features.
Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs.
Help maintain code quality, organization, and automatization.
Have a lot of fun and get exposed to real projects.
Ideal Profile
Java & Kotlin for Android, mySQL.
Swift & Objective-C for IOS, frameworks such as Core Data, Core Animation
Familiarity with RESTful APIs to connect IOS/Android applications to back-end services
Knowledge of other web technologies and UI/UX standards
Knowledge of IOS/Android UI design principles, patterns, and best practices
Knowledge of the open-source IOS/Android ecosystem and the libraries available for common tasks.
Passion and a knack for independently solving code challenges.
A lifelong learner who never stops pushing for new knowledge.
Excellent communication competencies (Oral & Written)
Good team player, self-motivated and can-do-attitude.
Stipend: $1,000 per month
What's on Offer?
Work alongside & learn from best in class talent
Excellent career development opportunities
Great work environment Full Time

Roles & Responsibilities
Responsibilities:

Produce fully functional mobile applications writing clean code
Write unit and UI tests to identify malfunctions
Troubleshoot and debug to optimize performance
Design interfaces to improve user experience
Ensure new and legacy applications meet quality standards

Must have at least 2-year experience in Mobile/Application development
Good knowledge of mobile APIs and UI standards
Familiar with PHP frameworks, and database systems (MySQL, Java, MariaDB,C#.NET, ASP.NET, Visual Basic .NET) will be an advantage
Experience with Linux/Redhat platform is a plus
Experience with Appstore/Playstore publishing is a plus
Good documentation practice and well version control on document updates

WHAT YOU'LL DO
Development of Web/Mobile based application projects
Contribute to the development of high quality software products
Involvement in the Agile Methodology of Software Development Lifecycle
Writing of design & technical specifications
Software development as per our design specifications and standards
Software testing, performance tuning and trouble shooting
Perform unit testing & use tools for continuous integration, code review and use quality metrics
WHAT YOU'LL NEED
A high attention to design detail, with a general interest in usability and user experience.
The idea of helping users achieve their goals worldwide thrills you.
Results-oriented, Team player, able to Multi-task and work effectively in a fast-paced dynamic environment.
One or more years of working experience in development of iPhone and iPad applications using: Xcode 3.2.3 and/ or later; Objective-C.
Proficient in Mac OS X 10.6.4, iOS4 or higher.
DB, MSSQL DB & Subsonic
SVN or repository experience.
Visual Studio and ASP.NET 3.5
Knowledge of Photoshop, HTML5, JQuery and other similar CSS frameworks a plus.
Candidate must possess at least a Diploma, Bachelor's Degree in Engineering (Computer/Telecommunication) or equivalent.
At least 1 year of working experience in the related field is required for this position.

City

Job Type

Your role
Are you passionate about mobile development? Are you able to communicate with global stakeholders? We are looking for someone to:
develop native iOS mobile applicationdesign and develop solutions to meet business specifications;collaborate with the technical members to suggest appropriate alternatives
Your team
You will be part of the APAC Touchpoint Development team based in Singapore; working with local & global developers, and business across APAC and Switzerland.
Your expertise
You have:
Bachelor’s Degree/ Master’s Degree
at least 5 year of experience in native mobile app development;experience in native development for iOS using Swiftexperience in implementing security in mobile appsexperience in performance optimization of mobile appsexperience in consuming RESTful services, JSON, and HTTP.strong analytical and problem-solving skills
About us
UBS is the world’s largest and only truly global wealth manager. We operate through four business divisions: Global Wealth Management, Personal & Corporate Banking, Asset Management and the Investment Bank. Our global reach and the breadth of our expertise set us apart from our competitors.

With more than 70,000 employees, we have a presence in all major financial centers in more than 50 countries. Do you want to be one of us?
How we hire
This role requires an assessment on application. Learn more about how we hire: www.ubs.com/global/en/careers/experienced-professionals.html
Join us
At UBS, we embrace flexible ways of working when the role permits. We offer different working arrangements like part-time, job-sharing and hybrid (office and home) working. Our purpose-led culture and global infrastructure help us connect, collaborate, and work together in agile ways to meet all our business needs.

From gaining new experiences in different roles to acquiring fresh knowledge and skills, we know that great work is never done alone. We know that it's our people, with their unique backgrounds, skills, experience levels and interests, who drive our ongoing success. Together we’re more than ourselves. Ready to be part of #teamUBS and make an impact?

Disclaimer / Policy Statements
UBS is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We respect and seek to empower each individual and support the diverse cultures, perspectives, skills and experiences within our workforce. Singapore

Software engineer opportunity to work in hybrid mobile application (Android & IOS) development:

Salary package up to $6,500
Focusing the backend application services development
Exploring to technology/engineering industries in Singapore
Opportunity to work on Research & Development projects
Involvement in cloud technologies such as docker containers, serverless framework, AWS, etc

min. 1 year of working experience in mobile development project
Skills in Angular, KendoUI, JavaScript, C#, Flutter, React Native, etc
no experience is ok, training provided

Spark Systems is a company conceptualized and started in April 2016. Spark Systems’ focus is on building the next generation of FX trading platforms that are ultra-fast, resilient, low latency and cost-efficient. We seek to bridge the gap between product offerings and actual user needs. The unique position of SPARK SYSTEMS as the middleman allows us to play a facilitative role between liquidity providers and takers, enhancing FX solution.http://www.sparksystems.sgWe are looking for some amazing talents to join us!JAVA DEVELOPER As a Java Developer, you will gain first-hand knowledge to cutting edge and class leading technology for financial trading solutions; receive on the job coaching from senior members of the team; gain Forex market knowledge.Role & Responsibilities Successful candidates will grow into one or more of the following roles:Develop distributed and scalable server side solution for the core trade engine and its components, become low latency/high-performance programming expertDevelop distributed and scalable solution for market connectivity gateways using FIX or other financial protocol in a very low latency environmentDevelop top grade trading GUI application on multiple platforms (Desktop, Web and Mobile), become domain expert on UX (User Experience)Manage and support network and infrastructure catered for high performance distributed trading applicationsAssist new client onboarding and support client operation, gain first-hand knowledge with FX trading businessWho we are seeking Degree in Computer Science, a related technical field that involves programming, or combination of equivalent practical experience and educationStrong programming skills in at least one of the Object Oriented Language such as Java or C#Knowledge in one of the SQL databases such as PostgreSQL or OracleNumerical training with an analytical mindsetPassionate about programming or technology in generalFast-learner, able to research on his/her own through self-studyGood work ethic, resourceful and problem solverWorking experiences in Java programming or other programming languages either through coursework or industry internship will be an added advantage.Job Types: Full-time, PermanentSalary: $4,500.00 - $6,000.00 per monthBenefits:Additional leaveFlexible scheduleProfessional developmentSchedule:Flexible hoursMonday to FridaySupplemental Pay:Performance bonus Spark Systems is a company conceptualized and started in April 2016. Are you passionate about mobile development? Are you able to communicate with global stakeholders? We are looking for someone to:
develop native mobile applicationdesign and develop solutions to meet business specifications;collaborate with the technical members to suggest appropriate alternatives
Your team
You will be part of the APAC Touchpoint Development team based in Singapore; working with local & global developers, and business across APAC and Switzerland.
Your expertise
an engineering degree with proven 10+ years of experience in software development
5+ years of native Android (Java/Koltin) or native iOS (Swift) development experienceUnderstanding of Google’s Android or iOS design principles and interface guidelinesKnowledge of Version Control System (Git)experience in consuming RESTful services, JSON, and HTTP (and able to help other teams in their backend debuging)
It’ll be a bonus if you have:
knowledge in other mobile (such as React Native, Cordova)understanding on mobile app deployment process to different AppStoresmobile automated testing experience
#LI-SG
About us
UBS is the world’s largest and only truly global wealth manager. We operate through four business divisions: Global Wealth Management, Personal & Corporate Banking, Asset Management and the Investment Bank. Our global reach and the breadth of our expertise set us apart from our competitors.

With more than 70,000 employees, we have a presence in all major financial centers in more than 50 countries. Do you want to be one of us?
How we hire
This role requires an assessment on application. Learn more about how we hire: www.ubs.com/global/en/careers/experienced-professionals.html
Join us
At UBS, we embrace flexible ways of working when the role permits. We offer different working arrangements like part-time, job-sharing and hybrid (office and home) working. Our purpose-led culture and global infrastructure help us connect, collaborate, and work together in agile ways to meet all our business needs.

From gaining new experiences in different roles to acquiring fresh knowledge and skills, we know that great work is never done alone. We know that it's our people, with their unique backgrounds, skills, experience levels and interests, who drive our ongoing success. Together we’re more than ourselves. Ready to be part of #teamUBS and make an impact?

Disclaimer / Policy Statements
UBS is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We respect and seek to empower each individual and support the diverse cultures, perspectives, skills and experiences within our workforce. Singapore

Job ID

Job Description
Roles & Responsibilities
Job Description
As an Android Mobile Application Developer, you will be responsible for the following:
Developing and deliver Android applications and its features using Kotlin and MVVM architecture design pattern
Managing 3rd party open source libraries and versioning using Gradle
Maintaining quality of current code base through unit testing and assisting in regression testing
Facilitate the troubleshooting and resolving of pre- and post-production issues such as provide hotfixes whenever bugs are discovered
Maintaining technical documentations of Android development
Maintaining integrity of current git flow of current git repos
Assist and advise on UI/UX design capabilities and improvements, feasibility of new functionalities through capabilities of current Android technology
Participating in Sprint meetings such as planning and review meetings
Keep abreast of the latest in mobile technology and conduct research and prototyping using such technologies
This is a hands-on software development position in which you will be a senior developer working in a small team and collaborating with remote teams
The ideal candidate is flexible, self-motivated, a great collaborator and works effectively with all disciplines of the team
We value passion, creativity, responsibility, accountability, and top-notch engineering practices
Requirements:
Experience/ Skills & Knowledge in
Kotlin language and Android Standard Library
MVC/MVVM architecture
Unit testing
Android Studio, Editor Layout, and programmatic UI
Gradle
Git Flow and Agile methodology
Agile development (e.g. SCRUM, Lean Start-up)
Handling Google Developer account, Google Play Store Console and creating builds for submission to Play Store
Basic understanding in Big O notation and their respective time-space complexity
Familar with CI/CD and Fastlane will be an added advantage
Familiar with Postman, basic AWS services and using bundler for managing ruby gems will be an added advantage
Excellent analytical skills with a good problem-solving attitude
Ability to perform in a team environment
Apply via the following link:
https://www.flyscoot.com/en/job-detail?job=R0002152

We’re a world-leading smart mobility SaaS tech company with over 1,500,000 subscribers across 23 countries. Our teams are collaborative, vibrant and fast-growing, and all team members are empowered with the freedom to influence our products and technology.

Are you curious, innovative and passionate?
Do you take ownership, embrace challenges, and love problem-solving?

We’re looking for a Junior Mobile Engineer (iOS/Android) who will help us continue to build industry disruptive mobile applications and revolutionise the way our customers use technology.

Job Requirement
Design and develop scalable, feature-rich mobile applications for iOS/Android application
Consume RESTful/JSON services to power applications
Work with UI/UX designers to implement user-friendly solutions
Introduce new technologies into the team based on fit and suitability to deliver a solution
Be able to deep dive into the technical aspects needed for optimization of mobile applications
Job Description
BS Computer Science degree or equivalent industry experience
Prior internship experience into iOS/Android development experience
Willing to learn attitude
Creative thinking backed by strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Strong teamwork, coordination, and planning, self-driven, and ability to work at pace in a dynamic organization
Ability to work independently under a fast-paced environment and work on multiple projects at the same time.
Work well under pressure and meets tight deadlines We’re a world-leading smart mobility SaaS tech company with over 1,500,000 subscribers across 23 countries. Who are we?The GrowHub Innovation Company is a Singapore-based agritech firm with an exclusive commercial partnership with the Food Innovation Precinct Western Australia (FIPWA).Currently in eight markets across Australia and Asia Pacific, The Growhub offers access to trusted premium products at affordable rates through agri-food innovations and blockchain technology emerging from our innovation centre at FIPWA. With the capital, network and expertise, we use technology to engage and improve the experience of “farm to fork”.Our data enables producers to improve yields, it optimises distribution andenhances transparency to assure that consumers get what they paid for. Blockchain technology makes food traceable across the supply chain – so that you can trust in the food you eat.As a collective of motivated individuals, we believe in providing opportunities or capable people to exercise their talent and to achieve their potential.We are looking for a Frontend Developer (Internship) who will work with our partners in various countries to develop high quality web solutions. What is in it for the successful candidate : -You will be working in an environment where we treasure diversity and original thinking backed by rigorous analysis. A stipend of up to SGD1,200 will be provided during the attachment. Good performers who successfully graduated will be given preference for future employment with The GrowHub.An exciting career opportunity awaits for those who are up for the challenge. We believe in rewarding strong performers including employee share options. Fueling the business of fun.Not just a game-changer, it’s a life-changer. Designed to deliver a superior guest experience, the software solutions platform is a complete integrated solution made to enable business owners to achieve greater operational efficiency while reducing costs and increasing profitability.With Embed’s platform, a business (single or multi-location) has real-time visibility and control across the entire operation: a full range of games management, real-time prize inventory, from guest party planning and bookings via mobile to integrated point-of-sales, including bundles and upsell packages, self-recycling game card kiosks and so much more. And it is all interconnected.We have offices across the globe: USA, EMEA, and Asia. With more than 1,000 customers and over 3,000 installations in 56 countries, we are equipped and ready to empower Family Entertainment businesses with direct sales, services, and support anytime, anywhere.We are in the business of fun and no one takes fun more seriously than us, which is why we put our people at the heart of everything we do, and how we do it. Project Description
Luxoft, a DXC Technology company is the world-leading specialist in consulting, development and maintenance services across a variety of management systems.

Luxoft has a global reputation for our high-quality delivery of development, support and implementation expertise who will provide you a unique opportunity to receive enriching training.

What We Offer:
Top quality training to kick-start your careerYour own personal development planCompetitive compensation packageOpportunity to make an impact in one of our major Financial institutions across regions
Responsibilities
Develop web-based applications front-to-back including databaseDesign, code, and test Apps according to the standard development lifecycle;Develop prototypes to test potential solutionsWrite and review technical documents, including design, development, and revision
Skills
Must have
Minimum 1 year in native Mobile applications development on Android OSBasic knowledge of Kotlin, Kotlin core aspects, exception handing, understanding of how Kotlin converts to JavaBasic knowledge of the architecture of Android and how to best utilize itBasic understanding of MVVM architecture designBasic knowledge of hybrid mobile design principles, patterns, and best practicesBasic expertise in web services, and enterprise architectures, application development in Java and distributed system's engineering
Nice to have
Experienced in Banking or Financial industryExperience in implementing security in mobile appsExperience in performance optimization of mobile appsExperience in consuming RESTful services, JSON, and HTTP
Languages
English: C1 Advanced
Seniority
Junior
Relocation package
If needed, we can help you with relocation process.

Job Description:1. Responsible for the development of the front-end PC and mobile phone interface of the company's products.2. Responsible for the performance, optimization, and difficult problem analysis of WEB front-end programs.3. Participate in the hybrid mobile terminal development of the company's products.4. Participate in tech selection, framework research, and system design of WEB front-end.5. Participate in new tech research.Job Requirement:1. Candidate must possess a bachelor’s degree, proficient in Vue, React, familiar with one or more mobile development solutions such as react-native and Weex.At least 3 years’ experience in WEB front-end development.2. Familiar with JavaScript, deep understanding of front-end and back-end separation, Web semantics, object-oriented.3. We are looking for someone to join our team of developers (Back-End, Front-End and Mobile) and UI Designers in a multinational tanker company. The role will involve working on a variety of projects of varying sizes, writing apps to work in conjunction with APIs that our Back-End team develop. We develop both internal and customer-facing applications. We are looking to develop cross platform mobile apps, targeting both iOS and Android devices. We are looking for an enthusiastic developer with a great personality to complement our friendly team of developers. The ideal candidate is expected to be proficient in their field of mobile app development.


Responsibilities include:
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop mobile apps in React Native
Actively participate in analysis, design, coding and testing phase
Write clean, scalable code
Perform maintenance and troubleshooting of issues in existing solutions
Participate in R&D effort on new and exciting technologies
Propose suggestions to enhance existing solutions
Communicate task priorities and progress frequently to all stakeholders

Requirements:
Proficient at developing in React Native
Proven ability in integrating mobile applications with backend services (HTTP, REST, JSON, XML, OAuth, SQL technologies knowledge)
Sound knowledge of mobile application development, targeting cross platform development (iOS and Android)
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills and good team player with good communications skills
Excellent problem solving and analytical skills
Basic know how of Agile process and practices
A relevant Diploma, Degree or demonstratable experience

Advantageous but not mandatory:
Experience using source control with Git
Familiarity with Azure DevOps (formerly Visual Studio Team Services) We are looking for someone to join our team of developers (Back-End, Front-End and Mobile) and UI Designers in a multinational tanker company. We are hiring!
Elmich Pte Ltd, an established Singapore company since 1985 with offices in 6 other countries specializing in urban greenery and waterproofing products is looking for staffs with relevant experience in sales and technical support to join its existing team. Must be prepared to travel occasionally.

Requirements:
Diploma or Degree in Engineering, Architecture, or other relevant disciplines.
Minimum 2 years of sales/marketing or working experience in liaising with developers and architects providing products or services.
Good communication and interpersonal skills.
Provide technical assistance pre & post-sales at the project sites related to products.
Able to travel overseas for work-related business trip when required.
Benefits:
5-day work week with minimal overtime required.
13th month guaranteed.
Variable annual bonus.
Annual company paid overseas holidays when possible.
Heavily subsidized catered lunch.
Medical and Dental benefits.
Generous transport and mobile telephone allowances.
Centrally located office near MRT station and main bus routes.
A bright and inspiring work environment amongst professional colleagues.
Career development to leadership/management
This is an opportunity to join an expanding and fast-growing company with a lot of upward potential in this role.

Interested applicant, simply submit your application by emailing a detailed copy of your updated resume in MS Word format to info@elmich.com. We regret that only shortlisted candidate will be notified. We are hiring!

In2 is a data-driven experiential agency that specialises in delivering a comprehensive mix of on-ground activation and digital marketing campaigns to translate our client's brand story into a relevant, meaningful and memorable experience for their customers. We are entrusted with the reputation of Fortune 100 companies as well as promising SMEs around the region. So if you are keen to design cutting-edge solutions that can push a brand forward and back that up with some good old-fashioned hard work, we have an opening that will suit you.

A. Job Purpose
The front end developer works closely with the Art Department to develop web and mobile sites, email marketing and other digital touch points.

B. Roles and Responsibilities
Understand digital media design principles, UX and UI and brainstorm with designers on the best practices and approach to create engaging HTML experience across all devices
Develop website using standard HTML/CSS and JS/jQuery practices on Bootstrap framework
Create digital media assets like websites, microsites, mobile responsive web, interactive banners and marketing emails (eDM)
Recommend, implement and manage CMS-based website such as WordPress
Diagnose, debug, troubleshoot, and fix the configuration and integration issues while working in tandem with internal technical team and external media agencies
Fully test and QC all work to ensure it is suitably prepared for presentation by the project manager to client
Make sure that all work produced is to a high standard and within brand guidelines and specifications
C. Qualification and Experience
Two or more years of proven hands-on experience in front end (HTML) web development
Diploma or bachelor’s degree in Engineering, Computer Science, Information Technology, Mathematics or equivalent
Certification in Google Analytics and Google Tag Manager is a bonus
D. Knowledge, Skills and Attributes
Willing to put forward ideas and have a keen eye for details
A natural inclination for a mobile-first approach
Proven experience in CSS/(X)HTML: HTML, HTML5, CSS, CSS3, CSS media queries, Javascript, jQuery, professional-level hand coded HTML and CSS skills, along with the ability to hand code from Photoshop mock-ups
Knowledge of JavaScript and an understanding of popular libraries and frameworks
Well-versed in HTML coding of websites, microsites, mobile responsive web, interactive banners and marketing emails (eDM)
Proficiency in developing websites using CMS (Wordpress, Joomla) and responsive cross-platform HTML pages
Working knowledge of CSS framework such as Bootstrap and Foundation
Experience in placing proper meta tags in HTML for SEO
Basic knowledge of PHP and MySQL database is a plus
Candidates with certification in Google Analytics and Google Tag Manager will be prioritised In2 is a data-driven experiential agency that specialises in delivering a comprehensive mix of on-ground activation and digital marketing campaigns to translate our client's brand story into a relevant, meaningful and memorable experience for their customers. Do you believe your designs and code could change the world? If YES, read on!
Mavericks Consulting is a powerhouse of skilled IT professionals who love their craft. We solve complex business problems with simple working solutions by applying Agile software development practices. We provide consultancy advice, develop prototypes for experimentation and validate ideas quickly. We love to write code and build systems that put smiles on our delighted users. We share and have fun together on our continuous learning journey.
Join us and multiply the fun and awesomeness of our workplace!
Your Role and Responsibilities
Adopting Agile and other best practices to create meaningful solutions
Applying scalable design patterns and clean code practices to develop high-quality software that is easily extensible, maintainable and readable
Collaborating with amazing people of different backgrounds and skillsets to solve challenging and complex problems
Actively contributing with your ideas and passion
Being flexible and open to feedback
Adopting a positive learning and growth mindset in all areas of your work
Empathising with stakeholders to develop appropriate, actionable and holistic working solutions
Creating and maintaining a dynamic and inclusive work environment
Genuinely wanting to help change the world
The Qualifications To Be a Maverick
1. Minimum Qualifications
Good understanding of at least one programming language and at least one programming paradigm (OOP, FP)
Experience in writing production-ready code, complete with unit testing and mocking
Worked collaboratively with others to deliver a complete working solution to production
Some experience with clean code practices
Experience in either backend or frontend development (with some working knowledge of the other)
Experience with code versioning tools such as Git
2. Desirable Qualifications
Experience working in cross-functional Agile software engineering teams that used practices like Kanban/Scrum/Lean/XP, Test Driven Development (TDD), Continuous Integration/ Continuous Delivery (CI/CD), etc.
Worked with multiple languages (e.g. Java, Ruby, Python, Scala, GoLang, etc.)
Good understanding of end-to-end application architecture
Experience in other areas of the SDLC (e.g. Testing, Deployment, Requirement Gathering, etc.)
Experience with DevOps practices and Automation tools
Experience working in different development projects of various industries
Experience with developing different applications (e.g. Web, Mobile, Cloud, etc.)
More about the job
Salary and Benefits
Competitive salary package (including bonuses)
Medical and Dental insurance for you and your dependents
Telecommunications allowance
Learning and Development
Book and Training allowances
Diverse Career Progression Opportunities
Personal Development Opportunities
Work Arrangement
Good work-life balance
Flexible work arrangements
Open office concept
Dress Code
(Generally) Smart-casual
Formal with some clients

Hi! Our awesome company is looking for University Interns who have experience in Web Development, & able to commit for a Full-Time Internship of 3 months or more (longer durations preferred).
About Us:
MindFlex Education's internship programme aims to provide internships which are fulfilling, as well as practical in real-world situations
Our office culture is fun, young & encouraging. We take our work, as well as our fun seriously
We provide full-time job opportunities for interns who have excelled in their internship
Enjoy a modern office environment with exciting facilities, such as a PS5, Full-Sized Pool Table, High-End Karaoke System & more
Close-knit team of 15-20 pax, strictly NO office politics, NO over-time culture, NO bring-work-home culture
Web Developer Intern Roles and Responsibilities:
Improve & automate company's business process through creation of new PHP web applications & improvement of existing code.
Review of company's existing process systems to improve UI/UX for both internal and external users.
Be involved in improvement of company's iOS & Android application
Connecting SQL Databases to developed web applications
Review and improve company's current cronjobs and APIs for both internal and external software.
Ensure that new projects are moved from development phase to production phase smoothly, and are both desktop & mobile friendly.
Spearhead development of new landing pages for company's website on WordPress platform, with usage of HTML & CSS code involved.
Modify and improve current landing pages for company's website, with the addition of new functionalities.
Data mining of websites and database for information to be used in company's IT projects.
Learning Outcomes & Objectives:
Intern will be exposed to the movement of IT projects from development phase to production phase in a systematic & meticulous manner.
Intern will have the first-hand experience of building code which can be translated into real-world business usage, to solve actual business problems.
Intern will learn how to manage expectations of different stakeholders, in particular balancing between "design wants" of the company and limitations of existing web platforms.
Intern will gain valuable first-hand experience of developing mobile applications, as well as creating new website landing pages from scratch in a professional setting.
Intern will gain insights on mining data content and using it for real-life application purposes.
Intern will be able to review and suggest opinions on how certain UI/UX interfaces of the company can be improved, and carry out plans for improvement.
Intern will also be able to review codes and script written by previous developers; learning from examples and improvement on existing code.
Intern will also have access to a "senior developer" who will be able to answer queries & troubleshoot whever necessary
Requirements:
Has to be a current University Undergraduate in a computing-related course
Possess some previous experience with website designing / programming
Proficient with PHP, Javascript, HTML, CSS, Languages
A good team player who is able to communicate effectively with various internal and external stakeholders
Ability to think critically and be able to suggest possible improvements to existing company software systems
Possess adequate problem-solving skills to tackle day-to-day issues independently
Working Hours, Location & Remuneration:
5 Days Work Week, Weekdays 9.00am - 6.30pm
Midview City (Sin Ming Lane)
Closest MRTs: Bright-Hill MRT (Door-Step), Bishan / Marymount MRT (nearby)
$1,000/Month (University)
Interns will also be given several days of paid leave (depending on internship period)

Fun Working Environment with No Office Politics!

Close-Knit Team of 15-20 Pax
Spacious Office with Modern & Fun Entertainment Facilities (Pool Table, Playstation 5, Karaoke Set, Board Games...etc)
Company Meals / Outings / Events / Bonding Activities
Great & Enjoyable Company Culture
Many of our interns have also converted to full-time & contract positions after their internship as they thoroughly enjoyed their learning experience with us
Conveniently located with New Bright Hill MRT at Doorstep

JOB DESCRIPTIONWe are looking for an L1 Support Engineer to provide enterprise-level assistance to our customers. You will diagnose and troubleshoot basic software and hardware problems and escalate unresolved issues for L2 support to appropriate internal teams e.g. software developers and hardware engineersTechnical Support Engineer responsibilities include service ticket registration, monitoring and analyzing the health status of devices in portals, resolving basic technical issues, configuration control, and using remote desktop connections to provide immediate support. You will use email and chat applications to give clients quick answers to simple IT and hardware issues. For more complex problems that require nuanced instruction, you will contact clients via phone and/or provide clear, written instructions and technical manuals.JOB RESPONSIBILITIES Ask customers targeted questions to quickly understand the root of the problemTrack computer system issues through to resolution, within agreed time limitsTalk to clients through a series of actions, either via phone, email, or chat, until they’ve solved a technical issueProvide prompt and accurate feedback to customersRefer to internal database or resources to provide accurate tech solutionsEnsure all issues are properly loggedPrioritize and manage several open issues at one timeFollow up with clients to ensure the systems are fully functional after troubleshootingPrepare accurate and timely reportsMaintain jovial relationships with clientsJOB REQUIREMENTSDiploma in Engineering (Electrical & Electronic, Computer Science, Telecommunication, Information System of the equivalent)Proven work experience as an L1 Engineer, Desktop Support Engineer, IT Help Desk Technician, or similar role. We are looking for experienced Android Developers to join our team in the role to develop Android mobile apps for our clients.
Responsibilities:
Design and development of mission critical applications using native app development for Android platform.
Knowledge of Xamarin framework is an advantage
Write XAML layout, positioning and server-side code for apps.
Develop prototypes and create robust high-volume production applications
Build internal systems and support business needs with your domain expertise.

Expert knowledge of Web Services, SOAP, REST , JQuery and JSON.
Strong Performance engineering skills.

Experience in C# and MS SQL is for Xamarin platform development is a plus
Good Unit Testing and Integration Testing practices.
Good verbal and written English language skills.
Ability to multi-task and manage multiple assignments in a fast-paced environment.

IntroductionAutomata Network (https://ata.network) is a decentralized service protocol that provides privacy middlewares for dApps on Ethereum and Polkadot to achieve privacy, high assurance and frictionless computation. Leveraging on the latest crypto and privacy-protection algorithms, along with hardware-based trust, the service protocol enables versatile use-cases not previously possible in the past, such as anonymous voting, MEV minimization, and no-tracking indexing.It is built by the industry’s foremost blockchain veterans and award-winning researchers, who previously worked at Zilliqa, LongHash, and the National University of Singapore. Founded in 2019, Automata Network is a recipient of Web3 Grant (2020), and a participant of the Web 3.0 Bootcamp (2020), Berkeley Blockchain Xcelerator (2021), Polkadot Decoded Mainstage speaker (2021). It has raised $3.4 million in total funding in early 2021.We are looking for self-driven and experienced frontend developers who can build Dapps with a product mindset. You are expected to work closely with the core team members to build user-friendly interfaces. We are based in Singapore but remote working is also acceptable.ResponsibilitiesCreate production-grade Dapps running on desktop or mobile platformsCollaborate with backend developers (e.g. blockchain, oracle) to exchange data through APIs.Perform design reviews and code reviews regularlyCreate technical specifications and documentationQualificationsKnowledge of Dapps and crypto is a mustOver 2 years of experience in frontend developmentExperience in web development frameworks such as React or Vue.Ability to collaborate with designers using tools such as FigmaFamiliarity with open-source development and collaborationsStrong problem-solving and communication skillsFast learner on new technologiesPerksGreat career development opportunities in a growing companyCompetitive compensation with crypto incentivesFlexible working hours and casual work attireJob Types: Full-time, PermanentSalary: $5,000.00 - $8,000.00 per monthSchedule:Flexible hoursMonday to FridayExperience:Dapps: 1 year (Preferred)Front End Developer: 2 years (Preferred) IntroductionAutomata Network (https://ata.network) is a decentralized service protocol that provides privacy middlewares for dApps on Ethereum and Polkadot to achieve privacy, high assurance and frictionless computation. Who We Are
We are a fast-growing, fully-remote game development company based in Singapore. Our team is located all over the planet. We have people in Thailand, Spain, India, UK, Finland and more, all working together to create amazing experiences for our users. We specialise in blockchain-connected, AR-enabled game development, and are expanding our Unity development team to help us speed up progress and put an even slicker finish on our products.
Who You Are
A passionate game developer who is excited to solve challenges in a cutting-edge field, exploring new technologies and ways to engage gamers. You keep yourself up to speed on related technologies, and care deeply about producing high quality content that you yourself would love to play. You can collaborate well with team members and work under your own steam to complete tasks as required, but know when to enlist the help of others.
Boring Technical Details
General Duties
Primarily, you will be working with the mobile team, directly under our Head of Mobile Tech, to help architect and build our latest mobile game.
Required Skills

Production experience developing for mobile platforms in Unity
Experience with VCS (particularly Git & GitHub)
Experience working as part of a development team
A good grounding in SOLID & OOP coding principles, particularly in regards to C#.

Nice To Have

Experience optimising Unity 3D performance for Android and iOS
Experience working with 3D assets & tools (e.g., Blender)
Experience in Augmented Reality technologies
Understanding of a variety of software architecture patterns
Experience conducting and collaborating on peer code reviews

Company DescriptionBluente is an early stage enterprise language SaaS firm. We are the world’s first mobile app that helps learners achieve business language proficiency. Our vision is to connect international communities globally through language.Our app is now live on the app store and we have just secured our first round of funding.We’re looking for people who are enthusiastic about our product but also fast and independent learners. As a software engineer at an early-stage company, you’ll be an essential part of the product team and will be shipping code daily to a rapidly growing user base.Why this role?Get your hands dirty: As one of our initial members, you’ll play a role in shaping the product and learn multiple aspects of software engineering.Fast-paced: You’ll be involved with product development in every angle, from front-end to back-end, to infrastructure.Mentorship: You’ll be working closely with our CTO, an ex-Goldman Sachs, former Stashaway alumni.Build a product that counts:  We believe we can change the language learning space and help break the communication barriers for people globally. We hope you are interested too!Join at an exciting time:  We have just received our first round of funding and are ready to scale and grow. Company Description Kinexcs is a multi-disciplinary digital health start-up at the forefront of a rapidly booming industry. It is a data-driven digital therapy platform & wearables company to enable and empower people for mobility and a better life. Our mission is to organize the movement of cities. We believe that technology will change how we move, and that our Core Mobility Engine has the power to fuel the transformation of the mobility and logistics sectors. The SWAT engineering team is on a mission to build a suite of transport and logistics applications which will empower businesses to change the way they organise movement.
As a Mobile Engineer on the Engineering team, you will be working with cutting-edge technology to solve complex engineering and user problems at scale. SWAT operates in Singapore, Australia, Japan, The Philippines, Thailand and Vietnam. We are tackling some of the most challenging transport/logistics problems in the world’s most congested cities.
You will have the opportunity to work with a cross-functional team of Product Designers, Software Engineers, Data Scientist and Product Managers within our organization to solve complex problems and build features and experiences on our mobile applications to drive the growth of our business.
Responsibilities:

Responsible for creating beautiful, scalable, and performant experiences on our mobile applications
Develop and maintain fast, bug-free, and re-usable components for our internal component library
Working closely with the Product, Design and Engineering teams to define and develop the company’s mobile experiences and new features
Work closely with our product design team to translate design into fully functional experiences


Requirements:

BS degree in Computer Science, similar technical field of study or equivalent practical experience.
At least 2 years of experience working on Javascript development, iOS or Android
Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Ability to collaborate with a multidisciplinary and multicultural team of Software Engineers, Product Designers, User Researchers, Data Scientists and Data Analysts to come up with solutions to problems
Experience using ReactJS or React Native frameworks is a plus Our mission is to organize the movement of cities. We believe that technology will change how we move, and that our Core Mobility Engine has the power to fuel the transformation of the mobility and logistics sectors. The SWAT engineering team is on a mission to build a suite of transport and logistics applications which will empower businesses to change the way they organise movement.
As a Mobile Engineer on the Engineering team, you will be working with cutting-edge technology to solve complex engineering and user problems at scale. SWAT operates in Singapore, Australia, Japan, The Philippines, Thailand and Vietnam. We are tackling some of the most challenging transport/logistics problems in the world’s most congested cities.

Kinexcs is an AI-driven Healthtech startup headquartered in Singapore. Our vision is to enable better quality of life for all through mobility empowerment. Founded in 2015, our products have gone to achieve international acclaim, most recently winning the James Dyson Award and are now looking to expand our team to build innovative products that will be distributed globally.Job Summary You will be part of the team realizing the vision of an award-winning system that aims to enable better mobility and a better quality of life. Be the owner and inventor of the product’s unique software systems that will disrupt conventional and traditional physical therapy pathways to enhance the lives of medical staff and patients.You will be working closely with Product and Management teams to conceptualise and design materials that give a voice to Kinexcs’ brand and product values. We are looking for driven developers that will join the core tech team with senior industry advisors. Do you believe your designs and code could change the world? If YES, read on!
Mavericks Consulting is a powerhouse of skilled IT professionals who love their craft. We solve complex business problems by applying agile software development practices and produce simple working solutions.
Mavericks collaborates closely with clients to achieve their business goals. We provide consultancy advice, develop prototypes to experiment and validate ideas quickly. We develop robust and reliable operational systems within weeks, not months. We love to write code and we build systems that put smiles on faces of our delighted users.
We believe in sharing our knowledge, upskilling and growing with the developer community. We organise tech related workshops and bootcamps to learn from each other. We share and have fun together in our continuous learning journey.
We are looking for like minded Mavericks to join us and multiply the fun and awesomeness at our workplace.
Your Role and Responsibilities
Writing quality code alongside your development team using best development practices such as Test Driven Development (TDD), Continuous Integration/ Continuous Delivery (CI/CD), Domain Driven Modelling, OOP
Creating and maintaining a dynamic and collaborative environment
Be flexible and open to receiving feedback
Learning something new everyday, working and pairing with amazing people
Championing Agile development practices to create meaningful technical solutions
Be up-to-date with emerging trends in mobile technology
Design, envision and build applications for iOS/ Android platforms
Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications
Actively contributing to the company with your ideas
Genuinely wanting to help to change the world
The Qualifications To Be a Maverick
1. Professional Experience
Worked in high performance cross-functional Agile software engineering teams
Knowing and having practiced basic Agile practices such as Kanban/Scrum/Lean/XP etc, Test Driven Development (TDD), Continuous Integration/ Continuous Delivery (CI/CD)
Played cross functional roles
2. Technical Experience
Experience with Native application development (iOS and/or Android)
Writing unit tests for mobile application codes
Knowledge of automated functional tests or UI tests
Experience with Object-oriented programming (OOP) and object modeling
Knowledge of iOS/ Android UI design principles , patterns and best practices
Knowledge of iOS/ Android SDK and ecosystem of tools, libraries and frameworks
Experience with design patterns such as MVVM, MVC
Setting up or have working knowledge of CI pipeline for the mobile application
Experience with programming languages such as Java, Kotlin, Objective-C, Swift, Javascript, etc
Knowledge/ experience of cross-platform frameworks like React Native, Flutter, etc
Experience with APIs to connect applications to back-end services
Experience with code versioning tools such as Git
Publishing mobile apps to Google Play Store or iOS App Store
Application benchmarking and optimisation
Experience with distributing apps to stakeholders, beta users using tools like Hockeyapp or TestFlight
More about the job
Salary and Benefits
Competitive salary package (including bonuses)
Medical and Dental insurance for you and your dependents
Telecommunications allowance
Financial and logistical support for Work Visa procurement and relocation (if applicable)
Learning and Development
Book and Training allowances
Diverse Career Progression Opportunities
Personal Development Opportunities
Work Arrangement
Good work-life balance
Flexible work arrangements
Open office concept
Dress Code
(Generally) Smart-casual
Formal with some clients

We are hiring!
Elmich Pte Ltd, an established Singapore company since 1985 with offices in 6 other countries specializing in urban greenery and waterproofing products is looking for staffs with relevant experience in sales and technical support to join its existing team. Must be prepared to travel occasionally.

Requirements:
Diploma or Degree in Engineering, Architecture, or other relevant disciplines.
Minimum 2 years of sales/marketing or working experience in liaising with developers and architects providing products or services.
Good communication and interpersonal skills.
Provide technical assistance pre & post-sales at the project sites related to products.
Able to travel overseas for work-related business trip when required.
Benefits:
5-day work week with minimal overtime required.
13th month guaranteed.
Variable annual bonus.
Annual company paid overseas holidays when possible.
Heavily subsidized catered lunch.
Medical and Dental benefits.
Generous transport and mobile telephone allowances.
Centrally located office near MRT station and main bus routes.
A bright and inspiring work environment amongst professional colleagues.
Career development to leadership/management
This is an opportunity to join an expanding and fast-growing company with a lot of upward potential in this role.

Interested applicant, simply submit your application by emailing a detailed copy of your updated resume in MS Word format to info@elmich.com. We regret that only shortlisted candidate will be notified. We are hiring!

Job Description & Requirements
Design overall architecture of the mobile architecture
Maintain quality and ensure responsiveness of applications
Collaborate with product and operation team to design and launch new features
Maintain code integrity and organization
Responsible for the company's mobile product development, optimization and maintenance.
To participate in the core system design and technical solutions discussion as well as development.

Job Requirements
React-Native, iOS and Android experience
Working experience in software engineering or related field is required for this position.

As part of our software team, you will help develop and maintain the software needs of our projects. You will work closely with customers, IT staff, engineers and various stakeholders to define software requirements, as well as be expected to be able to analyse, design, code, confiture, test and maintain systems. You are in charge that ensuring software quality, security and application code performance are met after review; and as is good industry practice, you should be able to document and maintain software functionality through the preparation of design documents, operating manuals and other documents pertaining to the work as required.
Along with the Project Manager / Business Analyst, you will also provide hands-on training to the customers for developed systems and provide post deployment system support.
A curious mind is necessary since you'd be expected to explore new technology and its development and subsequent implementation.
Hiring Requirements
Diploma in Computer Science, IT or equivalent
Knowledge of programming languages (C#, .Net, Java, JavaScript, HTML5)
Knowledge of SQL such as queries, stored procedures, views, functions, triggers
Mobile development experience is a plus
Good communication and presentation skills
Good analytical skills
Open minded, self-motivated and willing to learn new things.
A "Can do" attitude to problem solving
Highly organised and detailed oriented
Able to self prioritise and meet deadlines

Candidates with no experience are welcome to apply. We are interesting in your skillset. We don't expect someone to be good at everything or know all the stated programming language, but we do expect a proficiency in some of the aforementioned aspects.

Salary will be commensurate with your level of experience.

Summary
We are expanding our team and looking for a creative and energetic Unity Application Developer to join us. In this position you will create impactful simulations. We have a fast-paced collaborative environment where you will work with creative directors and programmers in the creation and implementation of leading edge Augmented Reality and Virtual Reality simulations. Development is done on multiple platforms such as Vive, Oculus, Hololens, Magic Leap and also mobile.


Responsibilities
Write clean testable and well documented code in C#
Work within Unity to build robust applications
Implement debug and refine core features
Collaborate effectively with a small high-energy team of illustrators, designer, programmers and 3D artists
Work with other developers to devise customized solutions to difficult problems
Be an integral part of a team focused on excellence
Share your knowledge to the team and organise workshops to grow the skills within the team
Find the cutting edge tools, library and assets to increase the productivity and improve our workflow
Required Skills
Strong Unity 3D programming skills
Good knowledge of Unity, including :-
Experience with scripting, textures, animation
UI programming, user session management
Mobile and AR/ VR application development
Understanding of 3D model data structure
Good understanding of object-oriented programming.
Passionate about creating 3D experiences.
Capable of working independently and within teams.
Well verse in writing code that
Calls Web Services/ RESTful API
Make GET/POST/PUT API calls
Parse JSON response as Objects
Good understanding of JWT token and OAuth

Fuelling the business of fun.Not just a game-changer, it’s a life-changer. Designed to deliver a superior guest experience, the software solutions platform is a complete integrated solution made to enable business owners to achieve greater operational efficiency while reducing costs and increasing profitability.With Embed’s platform, a business (single or multi-location) has real-time visibility and control across the entire operation: a full range of games management, real-time prize inventory, from guest party planning and bookings via mobile to integrated point-of-sales, including bundles and upsell packages, self-recycling game card kiosks and so much more. And it is all interconnected.We have offices across the globe: USA, EMEA and Asia. With more than 1,000 customers and over 3,000 installations in 56 countries, we are equipped and ready to empower Family Entertainment businesses with direct sales, services and support anytime, anywhere.We are in the business of fun and no one takes fun more seriously than us, which is why we put our people at the heart of everything we do, and how we do it. Company DescriptionBluente is an early stage enterprise language SaaS firm. We are the world’s first mobile app that helps learners achieve business language proficiency. Our vision is to connect international communities globally through language.Our app is now live on the app store and we have just secured our first round of funding.We're looking for people who are enthusiastic about our product but also fast and independent learners. As a software engineer at an early-stage company, you'll be an essential part of the product team and will be shipping code daily to a rapidly growing user base.Why this role?Get your hands dirty: As one of our initial members, you'll play a role in shaping the product and learn multiple aspects of software engineering.Fast-paced:  You'll be involved with product development in every angle, from front-end to back-end, to infrastructure.Mentorship: You’ll be working closely with our CTO, an ex-Goldman Sachs, former Stashaway alumni.Build a product that counts: We believe we can change the language learning space and help break the communication barriers for people globally. We hope you are interested too!Join at an exciting time: We have just received our first round of funding and are ready to scale and grow. You'll be an essential part of our journey and be involved in building exciting features that delight our users.Role: Backend DeveloperBe part of the core development teamTake charge of the Design, build, test, deploy & maintain high quality applications for mobile platform
Work closely with cross-functional teams to analyse, design, and ship new features
Build and publish applications in app stores
Continuously evaluate and implement new technologies in order to maximize development efficiency
Mentor other engineers in the team on adopting the right engineering practices
Participate in Agile development

Familiar with RESTful APIs
Experience with third-party libraries and APIs
Good understanding of the full mobile development life cycle
Experience with cross platform development (i.e. React native / Flutter) is a plus
Strong communication skills

Company Profile
Company Description
Kinexcs is an AI-driven Healthtech startup headquartered in Singapore. Our vision is to enable better quality of life for all through mobility empowerment. Founded in 2015, our products have gone to achieve international acclaim, most recently winning the James Dyson Award and are now looking to expand our team to build innovative products that will be distributed globally.
Job Description
Job Summary
You will be part of the team realizing the vision of an award-winning system that aims to enable better mobility and a better quality of life. Be the owner and inventor of the product’s unique software systems that will disrupt conventional and traditional physical therapy pathways to enhance the lives of medical staff and patients.
You will be working closely with Product and Management teams to conceptualise and design materials that give a voice to Kinexcs’ brand and product values. We are looking for driven developers that will join the core tech team with senior industry advisors. You will be among our bright, talented and passionate team participating in the full software development life cycle, from conception to deployment.
Responsibilities
Proactively be a part of a cross-functional agile team to develop high performing, robust web/mobile and desktop applications.
 Bridge the gap between design and technical implementation, focusing on product UI. You will create clean, simple and easy to use interfaces that our diverse group of users will love.
Implementing UI elements such as input controls, navigational components and informational components for mobile, desktop or web applications
 Incorporating customer feedback, usage metrics, and usability findings into design in order to enhance user experience
 Skills & QualificationsPursuing a Bachelor’s in Computer Science, Engineering, Design or relevant fieldGood knowledge of Object-oriented Programming (OOP), Functional Programming Principles, and Design patterns (MVC, MVVM, etc).Experience in frontend mobile development (i.e. Flutter, ReactNative) or frontend web development (i.e. Java, AngularJS, ReactJS) etc.Some experience in Backend development (i.e. python Flask, Javascript) would be a plusStrong understanding of data structures, REST APIsTeam spirit; strong communication skills to collaborate with various stakeholdersExuding strong leadership with strong inter-personal communication skills are greatly preferrableAble to work in a fast-paced startup environment

Senior / Principal Android Developer – Technology Development Group
Who are we?
At EZ-Link, we are more than just the people behind a card.
We are the enablers of connecting people, creating smoother journeys for the young and old.
For twenty years, we’ve been a trusted part of Singapore’s fabric and we continue to punch above our weight. Having issued 40 million cards, charms and wearables, our products are widely used for shopping, dining, private transport, government services and community services at more than 30,000 acceptance points across the island. We are also not just in the business of micro-payments, but also creating smart motoring solutions for road tolls and carpark payments.
The department
As an Android Developer, you will work closely with team members in an Agile team. You will work alongside your scrum team, and participate in the full development life cycle, including development, release and implementation support. In doing so, you will be at the forefront of transformation in EZ-Link.
Ensuring quality and performance of application to specifications and maintaining code quality, are how we define and measure success in EZ-Link. You will be part of contributing towards achieving results in your day-to-day role.
Roles & Responsibilities
You will:
Work in the Agile team and work closely with Product Owners, Business Analysts and other team members to achieve common goals.
Develop/maintain functionalities to support EZ-Link’s Transit and Payment eco-system and legacy applications. (For mobile developers, EZL's mobile application.
Participate in the activities such as design, tasks estimation, development, unit testing, releases and production support.
Improve code quality and perform code reviews.
Develop/maintain automated unit test scripts, perform unit testing and validation of requirements with BA/users/stakeholders.
Perform investigation/troubleshooting of issues raised on mobile application/mircoservices/applications.
Keep up-to-date of new technologies, explore and experiment technologies that will help to improve technical efficiencies.
Provide training to end users and documentation to support knowledge transfer.
Develop Proof-of-Concept for new idealation or initiviates.
Identify areas of improvement, improve development efficiency and application quality.
Conduct and lead code review session.
Lead and mentor junior/senior software developer.
Lead, participate and contribute in solution/technical and architecture design.
Subject matter expert in iOS/Android application development framework.
Why EZ-Link?
We work hand in hand with the nation to build a truly smart and digital home and have embarked on a digital transformation to reinvent ourselves, bringing about enhanced user experience and strengthening our capabilities for future business growth. At the forefront, our app continues to lead our new initiatives and collaborations that excite our users.
If the above energizes and motivates you, come join us and embark on this exciting journey. Come and help us make a positive impact and have a say in the daily journeys of Singaporeans.
An ideal candidate should have the following
At least 5 years of hands-on experience in Android mobile development (Java).
Experience with RESTful APIs to integrate with back-end services.
Experience with React Native.
Experience in integrating with Firebase products, mainly Analytics, FCM.
Experience in integrating with Google location & map services.
Experience in working with Android libraries such as Retrofit.
Familiarity with VS App Centre is a plus.
Experience with software development tools like Git, Gradle & Jira Software.
Familiarity with Agile based development methodologies.
We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified. Senior / Principal Android Developer – Technology Development Group

Identify areas of improvement, improve development efficiency and application quality.
Conduct and lead code review session.
Lead and mentor junior/senior software developer.
Lead, participate and contribute in solution/technical and architecture design.
Subject matter expert in iOS/Android application development framework.
Why EZ-Link?
We work hand in hand with the nation to build a truly smart and digital home and have embarked on a digital transformation to reinvent ourselves, bringing about enhanced user experience and strengthening our capabilities for future business growth. At the forefront, our app continues to lead our new initiatives and collaborations that excite our users.
If the above energizes and motivates you, come join us and embark on this exciting journey. Come and help us make a positive impact and have a say in the daily journeys of Singaporeans.
An ideal candidate should have the following
At least 5 years of hands-on experience in Android mobile development (Java).
Experience with RESTful APIs to integrate with back-end services.
Experience with React Native.
Experience in integrating with Firebase products, mainly Analytics, FCM.
Experience in integrating with Google location & map services.
Experience in working with Android libraries such as Retrofit.
Familiarity with VS App Centre is a plus.
Experience with software development tools like Git, Gradle & Jira Software.
Familiarity with Agile based development methodologies.
We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified. Senior / Principal Android Developer – Technology Development Group
Who are we?
At EZ-Link, we are more than just the people behind a card.
We are the enablers of connecting people, creating smoother journeys for the young and old.
For twenty years, we’ve been a trusted part of Singapore’s fabric and we continue to punch above our weight. Having issued 40 million cards, charms and wearables, our products are widely used for shopping, dining, private transport, government services and community services at more than 30,000 acceptance points across the island. We are also not just in the business of micro-payments, but also creating smart motoring solutions for road tolls and carpark payments.
The department
As an Android Developer, you will work closely with team members in an Agile team. You will work alongside your scrum team, and participate in the full development life cycle, including development, release and implementation support. In doing so, you will be at the forefront of transformation in EZ-Link.
Ensuring quality and performance of application to specifications and maintaining code quality, are how we define and measure success in EZ-Link. You will be part of contributing towards achieving results in your day-to-day role.
Roles & Responsibilities
You will:
Work in the Agile team and work closely with Product Owners, Business Analysts and other team members to achieve common goals.
Develop/maintain functionalities to support EZ-Link’s Transit and Payment eco-system and legacy applications. (For mobile developers, EZL's mobile application.
Participate in the activities such as design, tasks estimation, development, unit testing, releases and production support.
Improve code quality and perform code reviews.
Develop/maintain automated unit test scripts, perform unit testing and validation of requirements with BA/users/stakeholders.
Perform investigation/troubleshooting of issues raised on mobile application/mircoservices/applications.
Keep up-to-date of new technologies, explore and experiment technologies that will help to improve technical efficiencies.
Provide training to end users and documentation to support knowledge transfer.
Develop Proof-of-Concept for new idealation or initiviates.
Identify areas of improvement, improve development efficiency and application quality.
Conduct and lead code review session.
Lead and mentor junior/senior software developer.
Lead, participate and contribute in solution/technical and architecture design.
Subject matter expert in iOS/Android application development framework.

About Atome

Atome is a leading buy now pay later brand in Asia offering consumers choice, convenience and flexibility in how they choose to shop and pay, with zero-interest payments over time.

We partner over 5,000 online and offline retailers in nine markets (Singapore, Indonesia, Malaysia, Hong Kong, Taiwan, Vietnam, Philippines, Thailand and mainland China).

Atome, pronounced as "A-Toe-Me', stands for "Available to Me". We enable consumers' deepest passions by making products and services more accessible, affordable, and available to them-via customisable features and a smarter shopping experience.

As part of the Advance Intelligence Group, an Al-driven technology company with over 1500+ employees in 12 markets worldwide, we are united by a shared vision and purpose: to Advance with Intelligence for a Better Life-for our customers, colleagues and communities.

Our culture is built on values that are core to who we are and what we stand for:

We foster an INNOVATION mindset
We achieve results with EFFICIENCY and excellence
We take pride in the QUALITY of our work
We uphold INTEGRITY in all we do
We embrace COLLABORATION to work across business lines and borders

Job Responsibilities:

Work closely with product managers, back-end developers, QA team and data team to build robust websites in mobile and desktop platforms.
Optimize code quality and fine-tune layouts/effect quality to provide smooth user experience.
Develop reusable, testable and well-structured code using the latest front-end technologies.
Troubleshoot and resolve issues/bugs with existing codes.
Cooperate with web infrastructure team and devops team to build libraries/services to enhance team efficiency.

Job Requirements:

You are qualified to have:

Minimum Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or any relevant field.
Solid understanding of HTML/ES6/Typescript/CSS.
Good understanding of computer networks, basic data structures.
Familiarity of React/Vue frameworks.
Good communication skills.


You will be prominent if you have:

Good understanding of basic algorithms.
Knowledge of back-end development and devops related topics.
Understanding of details in build process.
Multi-lingual due to regional coverage.
