companyName: HAIER SINGAPORE INVESTMENT HOLDING PTE. LTD.
listing_jobDesc:
Haier Group is a world-leading provider of solutions to better life. Focusing on user experience, Haier has been included on the list of BrandZTM Top 100 Most valuable Global Brands for two consecutive years as the world’s first and only IoT ecosystem brand.
Haier Singapore is one of the holding companies under Haier Group. As the integrated regional centre, Haier Singapore is the main platform to provide trading, R&D, legal, big data, cybersecurity and risk management supports to over 80 countries in Asia, Europe, Africa and North America markets.
As the continuous demands from global businesses, we are looking for experienced Front End Mobile Web Developer to support our data team in Singapore.
KEY RESPONSIBILITIES
Responsible for mobile web page development, participate in requirements review, UI review and man-hour assessment.
Responsible for mobile web framework design, coding and implementation, and can independently develop front-end pages.
Cooperate with back-end development engineers to complete various data interaction on the web side, dynamic information display and user interaction.
Responsible for front-end web related technology research and new technology research, undertake key and difficult technical challenges and online problems.
Responsible for the preparation of relevant technical documents, participate in the formulation of front-end development specifications and standards.
According to the company's software development specification requirements, prepare software development design documents.
KEY REQUIREMENTS
The ideal candidates we are looking for should be seasoned Information Security Professionals with:
Bachelor’s degree or above in computer related major with more than 3 years of front-end related work experiences.
Solid basic skills in Web/H5 front-end, proficient in mainstream web front-end technologies such as html 5/css 3/javascript, familiar with ES6 semantics.
Proficient in React framework, have a certain understanding of the underlying design of React source code, and have experience in Hybrid App related projects.
Familiar with HTTP protocol, understand the basic working principle of TCP/IP, familiar with commonly used web standards and specifications, familiar with front-end performance optimization, browser compatibility processing and network security.
Proficient in using version control tools such as Git and project construction tools such as Webpack/vite.
Familiar with the front-end mainstream design pattern MVC/MVVM, with componentization and OOP ideas, and good coding habits.
Work initiative, strong sense of responsibility, good interpersonal skills and teamwork spirit.
Good communication skills in English and Mandarin (to liaise with Chinese-speaking clients and customers). Haier Group is a world-leading provider of solutions to better life. Who We Are
We are a fast-growing, fully-remote game development company based in Singapore. Our team is located all over the planet. We have people in Thailand, Spain, India, UK, Finland and more, all working together to create amazing experiences for our users. We specialise in blockchain-connected, AR-enabled game development, and are expanding our Unity development team to help us speed up progress and put an even slicker finish on our products.
Who You Are
A passionate game developer who is excited to solve challenges in a cutting-edge field, exploring new technologies and ways to engage gamers. You keep yourself up to speed on related technologies, and care deeply about producing high quality content that you yourself would love to play. You can collaborate well with team members and work under your own steam to complete tasks as required, but know when to enlist the help of others.
Boring Technical Details
General Duties
Primarily, you will be working with the mobile team, directly under our Head of Mobile Tech, to help architect and build our latest mobile game.
Required Skills

Production experience developing for mobile platforms in Unity
Experience with VCS (particularly Git & GitHub)
Experience working as part of a development team
A good grounding in SOLID & OOP coding principles, particularly in regards to C#.

Nice To Have

Experience optimising Unity 3D performance for Android and iOS
Experience working with 3D assets & tools (e.g., Blender)
Experience in Augmented Reality technologies
Understanding of a variety of software architecture patterns
Experience conducting and collaborating on peer code reviews

Mobile Developer (iOS/Android)
Toku’s mission is to help companies engage with their customers efficiently. We have helped companies move all the voice communications to the cloud and recently embarked on creating products that help companies keep engaging with their customers no matter where their employees are working from.
Toku is currently getting into a scale-up mode. We want to continue creating momentum for our products in the APAC regions and helping customers with their communications needs. As we build the Product foundation, we are looking for an experienced mobile developer with excellent coding proficiency, problem-solving skills, and initiative to become an integral part of Toku’s product development team. Want to be part of our journey?
What would you be doing?
You will report to our Software Development Team Lead. You will be responsible for developing mobile application, SDK, bug fixing, testing, and documentation. You help with mobile application development based on client requirements.
Develop native mobile application with current best-practices
Participate in and contribute to all phases of the application development life cycle
Translating designs and wireframes into high-quality code
Working with agile squad(s) to conceptualize and build mobile applications.
Suggesting improvements to Mobile Application Architecture and design patterns
Maintain and enhance the app security and performance where needed
We would love to hear from you if you have:
Minimum 3 years of relevant working experience
Good in mobile development (Android/iOS)
Capable to integrate external SDK to mobile development
Familiar with web technology (PHP, NodeJS, ReactJS)
Familiar with SQL queries
Knowledge about telco (Freeswitch) will be a plus
What would you get?
Hybrid working environment
Training and Development
Discretionary Yearly Bonus & Salary Review
Healthcare Coverage based on location
20 days Paid Annual Leave (excluding Bank holidays)

Who are we?
At EZ-Link, we are more than just the people behind a card.
We are the enablers of connecting people, creating smoother journeys for the young and old.
For twenty years, we’ve been a trusted part of Singapore’s fabric and we continue to punch above our weight. Having issued 40 million cards, charms and wearables, our products are widely used for shopping, dining, private transport, government services and community services at more than 30,000 acceptance points across the island. We are also not just in the business of micro-payments, but also creating smart motoring solutions for road tolls and carpark payments.
The department
As a Quality Assurance Engineer, you will work closely with team members in an Agile team. You will work alongside your scrum team, whilst planning and executing testing for both mobile and back-end applications. In doing so, you will be at the forefront of transformation in EZ-Link.
Developing and prioritizing test cases and scenarios well are some of the ways your success will be measured in EZ-Link. You will be part of contributing towards achieving results in your day-to-day role.
Roles & Responsibilities
You will:
Work in the Agile team and work closely with Product Owners, Business Analysts and other team members to achieve common goals
Conduct functional, re-test, thorough regression and performance test on mobile application, system and microservices
Analyse the test results and discuss fixes with developers
Estimate test effort, prioritise, plan and coordinate testing activities
Analyse and clarify requirements with stakeholders or Business Analyst
Setup automated testing framework, create and maintain detailed test cases/scenario and test scripts.
Keep up-to-date of new technologies, explore and experiment technologies that will help to improve QA testing framework and strategies.
Why EZ-Link?
We work hand in hand with the nation to build a truly smart and digital home and have embarked on a digital transformation to reinvent ourselves, bringing about enhanced user experience and strengthening our capabilities for future business growth. At the forefront, our app continues to lead our new initiatives and collaborations that excite our users.
If the above energizes and motivates you, come join us and embark on this exciting journey. Come and help us make a positive impact and have a say in the daily journeys of Singaporeans.
An ideal candidate should have the following
At least 3+ years of hands-on experience in automated testing.
Experience with Test/Mocking tools like Cucumber, Appium, Locust & WireMock.
Experience with software development tools like Git, Gradle & Jira Software.
Familiarity with agile based development methodologies.

Design, build, test, deploy & maintain high quality applications for mobile platform
Work closely with cross-functional teams to analyse, design, and ship new features

Strong communication skills

Company Profile
Activate Interactive Pte Ltd (“Activate”) is a leading IT solution and service provider headquartered in Singapore with a presence in Malaysia and Indonesia. The homegrown company was founded in 1997 with the mission of positively impacting the lives of people around us and the environment we live in through the use of technology.
We offer quality, cost-effective and impactful IT solutions and services, including mobile and web applications and cloud technology. Over the years, we have helped government agencies and enterprises remove technology roadblocks and increase their business efficiency to better serve the communities.
To amplify our efforts in improving people’s lives, Activate also develops preventive healthcare solutions that serve to increase health awareness and improve population health.
We believe that the success of a company relies on the strengths of our employees. At Activate, we are committed to provide a conducive environment and develop our employees to realise their full potential.
From a three-person outfit, Activate has grown into a team of more than 150 employees, delivering more than 150 solutions and services to help our clients achieve growth and success.
We have opportunities for you to grow your career path and are looking for talented professionals to join our team.
Job Description
Roles & Responsibilities:
Assist in developing detailed, comprehensive, well-structured cases and review test result to determine system's functionality.
Manage and track to ensure proper closure of defects detected during testing
Liaise with internal teams (e.g. developers and project lead) to communicate on bugs
Create regression test suites and test cases in accordance with changing requirements
Conduct various tests such as Manual/Automated/Functional/Exploratory testing/Cross-Platform Testing for the various platforms (iOS, Android, Web)
Documentation of any test artefacts (i.e. test plan, test cases, test scenarios, test reports, emails reports, etc)
Design, develop and execute automation test scripts to exercise APIs, Websites and Mobile Application
He/She follows the instruction of the test leads and the test manager.
Requirements:
Curious mindset
Bulldog mentality
Meticulous eyes for detail
Strong verbal and written communication skills
Enjoy constant learning and working with new technologies
A natural tenacity, resiliency and determination.
Able to do scripting or programming. Eg c#, js, powershell, bash, .bat
Nitec/Diploma holders are welcomed to apply (year 3/ final year)
Able to commit for at least 6 months
Application Instructions
Please apply for this position by submitting your text CV using InternSG.

Company Profile
Activate Interactive Pte Ltd (“Activate”) is a leading IT solution and service provider headquartered in Singapore with a presence in Malaysia and Indonesia. The homegrown company was founded in 1997 with the mission of positively impacting the lives of people around us and the environment we live in through the use of technology.
We offer quality, cost-effective and impactful IT solutions and services, including mobile and web applications and cloud technology. Over the years, we have helped government agencies and enterprises remove technology roadblocks and increase their business efficiency to better serve the communities.
To amplify our efforts in improving people’s lives, Activate also develops preventive healthcare solutions that serve to increase health awareness and improve population health.
We believe that the success of a company relies on the strengths of our employees. At Activate, we are committed to provide a conducive environment and develop our employees to realise their full potential.
From a three-person outfit, Activate has grown into a team of more than 150 employees, delivering more than 150 solutions and services to help our clients achieve growth and success.
We have opportunities for you to grow your career path and are looking for talented professionals to join our team.
Job Description
Roles & Responsibilities:
Assist in developing detailed, comprehensive, well-structured cases and review test result to determine system's functionality.
Manage and track to ensure proper closure of defects detected during testing
Liaise with internal teams (e.g. developers and project lead) to communicate on bugs
Create regression test suites and test cases in accordance with changing requirements
Conduct various tests such as Manual/Automated/Functional/Exploratory testing/Cross-Platform Testing for the various platforms (iOS, Android, Web)
Documentation of any test artefacts (i.e. test plan, test cases, test scenarios, test reports, emails reports, etc)
Design, develop and execute automation test scripts to exercise APIs, Websites and Mobile Application
He/She follows the instruction of the test leads and the test manager.
Requirements:
Curious mindset
Bulldog mentality
Meticulous eyes for detail
Strong verbal and written communication skills
Enjoy constant learning and working with new technologies
A natural tenacity, resiliency and determination.
Able to do scripting or programming. Eg c#, js, powershell, bash, .bat
Nitec/Diploma holders are welcomed to apply (year 3/ final year)
Able to commit for at least 6 months
Application Instructions
Please apply for this position by submitting your text CV using InternSG.

Job Description
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop mobile apps in React Native.
Actively participate in analysis, design, coding and testing phase.
Write clean, scalable code
Perform maintenance and troubleshooting of issues in existing solutions.
Participate in R&D effort on new and exciting technologies.
Propose suggestions to enhance existing solutions.
Communicate task priorities and progress frequently to all stakeholders.
Job Requirements
Diploma/Degree in Computer Science or equivalent disciplines to IT
Major in Mobile App disciplines will be a bonus point
Solid understanding of mobile application UI/UX
Solid understanding of HTML DOM structure and have hands on experience on DOM libraries such as JQuery, Bootstrap, React JS, Angular JS, Node JS and similar technologies.
Hands on experiences of cross platform programming such as React Native, VUE, Flutter or similar technologies
Good understanding of RESTFUL API conceptsHands on experience with proven track records in native Objective-C/Swift or Java ME with full cycle delivery of product is a plus point
Good understanding and proven track records of using Cocoa Pods, Redux and Babel is a double plus.
Hands on design, develop, troubleshoot and debug programs
Knowledge of code/deployment management tools such as Jenkins, GitHub, Jira, Trello
Team player and taking imitative in agile working environment
Entry level will be considered
At least 2 to 3 years relevant working experiences Job Description

Designation
Web Developer
Date Listed
27 Mar 2022
Job Type
Entry Level / Junior Executive
Full/Perm
Job Period
Flexible Start, Permanent
Profession
IT / Information Technology
Industry
Computer and IT
Location Name
Temasek Boulevard, Suntec City, Singapore
Address
3 Temasek Blvd, Singapore 038983
Map
Allowance / Remuneration
$3,000 - 6,000 monthly
Company Profile
Affyn is a Singapore-based company building a blockchain-powered Metaverse project with a Free to Play, Play-to-Earn mobile game.
What makes Affyn Unique?
Play-to-Earn that is Free-to-Play A Play-to-Earn Metaverse that allows players to start playing and earning without any initial fee.
Sustainable Game Economy To ensure the rewards remain attractive to existing and new players in the long run, Affyn found the solution to maintain a sustainable and growing game economy.
Mobile Geolocation-Based Mobile geolocation-based gaming is on the rise, and Affyn will become the pioneer of the mobile Play-to-Earn category in the blockchain space.
Real World Token Utility Users who earn FYN do not have to convert into FIAT currency to use in the real world. Affyn provides special privileges and benefits when they pay in FYN.
https://www.affyn.com/
Job Description
Are you curious about buzzwords like Metaverse, Blockchain, De-Fi, NFT, Smart Contracts, etc.? At Affyn, you will find yourself becoming part of the early movement into this space. About Us
Affyn may be a startup from Singapore but our fanbase and investors are global. We are building a blockchain-powered Metaverse project with a Free-to-Play, Play-to-Earn mobile game with integrated geolocation where the virtual and real world converge. We also incorporate the fun element of gaming with blockchain technology such as the utility of NFTs. We want to build the community in Metaverse together, bring Metaverse and NFT to the mainstream.
We are looking for like-minded talent who are keen to join us as Web Developer. You are someone who:
• has an insatiable thirst for growth and learning, • want to build and grow together with usexperienced and completed the front-end architecture designknows the ins and outs of web developmentunderstand optimization and how to constantly improve the front-end architecture
What you'll need:2 to 5 years experience in front-end development, fresh graduates are welcomeProficient in HTML / CSS / Javascript, familiar with ES6/Typescript (pls check if we are using ES6)
• Proficient in React Framework. • Proficient in using but not reliant on mainstream front-end libraries. • Any experience with blockchain and web3.js is a plusGood command of English
Application Instructions
Please apply for this position by EMAILING YOUR RESUME TO

• has an insatiable thirst for growth and learning, • want to build and grow together with usexperienced and completed the front-end architecture designknows the ins and outs of web developmentunderstand optimization and how to constantly improve the front-end architecture
What you'll need:2 to 5 years experience in front-end development, fresh graduates are welcomeProficient in HTML / CSS / Javascript, familiar with ES6/Typescript (pls check if we are using ES6)
• Proficient in React Framework. • Proficient in using but not reliant on mainstream front-end libraries. • Any experience with blockchain and web3.js is a plusGood command of English

Working with the global team in Singapore and marketing team in Japan, this is a precious chance to gain international exposure and develop essential interpersonal skills in a global luxury brand.We are looking for a technically gifted and ambitious Full Stack Web Developer intern to join our Singapore team to support our website (www.ginzaxiaoma.com) and deliver our customers world-class user experience. Project Description
Are you an experienced and passionate Senior Mobile Application Developer with strong architecture sense looking to take a more active and impactful role in your work? Are you looking to take the next step in your career and really 'own' something?
Responsibilities
This specific role is related to shared mobile services in the area of mobile development. The base components and services for mobile development, as well as the mobile foundation server components, for example, notification and analytics, must be provided. Later, the development of mobile banking applications as a development service must be provided.
Within the team, you will be able to contribute in your current specified area of expertise.

As a member of the Delivery Team you will:
work in different roles across the whole solution lifecycle (system analysis & technical design, frontend- & backend-development, system integration, documentation, third level support)provide applications in best quality as requested by specificationsdocument your provided solutionsanalyze root-causes in case of incidents and provide solutions for solving the problemsupport the business in case of effort estimations and feasibility studiesperform code reviews and share best practices with colleagues
Skills
Must have
Bachelors degree in technology or related field required OR equitable experienceMinimum 4 years in native Mobile applications development on Android OSStrong knowledge of Kotlin, Kotlin core aspects, exception handing, understanding of how Kotlin converts to JavaVery good knowledge of the architecture of Android and how to best utilize itGood understanding of MVVM architecture designStrong knowledge of hybrid mobile design principles, patterns, and best practicesStrong expertise in web services, and enterprise architectures, application development in Java and distributed system's engineeringExperience in implementing security in mobile appsExperience in performance optimization of mobile appsExperience in consuming RESTful services, JSON, and HTTPStrong analytical and problem-solving skills
Nice to have
Experience with JavaScript, CSS, HTML5Experience in server-based application developmentVersion control system;Experience in app development process in an enterprise environment (testing, continuous integration, release process);Experience in building mobile application architecture.Mobile app deployment processKnowledge of agile development methodologies;Experience in coordinating team members
Languages
English: C1 Advanced
Seniority
Senior
Relocation package
If needed, we can help you with relocation process.

Led by Stanford and MIT alumni with years of professional and management experience, Tourego is a disruptive new force in the niche market of tourism finance, solving outbound travellers’ pain points through technology. We seek to undermine the existing order among the incumbent market players with our new ideas on how business should be done in this US$65b market.
Tourego is mentioned in Parliament as an example of an innovative homegrown start-up. More information can be found at Channel News Asia. (https://www.channelnewsasia.com/news/business/tourego-gst-tax-refunds-airport-tourists-10039630)
We are expanding our team to hire high-calibre and entrepreneurial developers like you to join us! It is an exciting time for our company as we are building enterprise from its inception and seeing it through to a resounding success.
Every member in Tourego plays a key role; this is your opportunity to be part of our fast-growing company and a highly-driven team!
JOB RESPONSIBILITY
Design and build mobile applications for the Android and/or iOS platform
Work closely with the backend server-side developers to develop APIs to support mobile functionality
Develop test plans/cases for unit/integration testing
Troubleshoot and debug to optimize performance
Publish applications to the App Stores or the Android market
Provide post-launch maintenance and support, constantly innovate the app functionality and design
Remain up to date with the technologies, frameworks, concepts and best practices for coding mobile applications
JOB REQUIREMENT
A degree/diploma, preferably in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or Information Technology
Minimum 2 years of working experience in developing mobile applications (native or hybrid) from conceptualization to testing to rollout
Possess strong knowledge of iOS programming (Swift/Objective-C, Cocoa Touch, UIKit, Xcode etc), and/or Android programming (Java, Android SDK)
Prior experience in the integration with 3rd party SDK
Fair understanding of HTML5, CSS3, jQuery etc
Possess knowledge of web services (XML, JSON, SOAP, REST)
Demonstrable portfolio of released applications on the App Store or the Android market
Superior analytical skills with a good problem-solving attitude
Must be self-driven, good team player with initiative and eagerness to pick up new knowledge or technologies
This is the job for you? Join Us Now!
We regret that only short-listed candidates will be notified . UXUI Developer
Date Listed

Intern/TS

Flexible Start, For At Least 3 Months

Healthcare
Location Name
71 Ayer Rajah Crescent, Singapore
Address
71 Ayer Rajah Crescent, Singapore 139951
Map
Allowance / Remuneration
$1,200 - 1,500 monthly
Company Profile
Kinexcs is an AI-driven health platform and wearables company enabling and empowering people for mobility and a better quality of life.
Job Description
About this Role:
You will be part of the team realizing the vision of an award-winning system that aims to enable better mobility and a better quality of life. Be the owner and inventor of the product’s unique user journey that will disrupt conventional and traditional physical therapy pathways to enhance the lives of medical staff and patients.
You will be working closely with Marketing. Sales and Product teams to conceptualise and design materials that give a voice to Kinexcs’ brand and product values. During your internship, you will interact with external stakeholders, conduct usability tests, design and develop patient/stakeholder journeys, wireframes and user interfaces through multiple design sprints and iterations.
Responsibilities and Duties:
Creating user-centric designs by understanding business requirements, and user feedback
Creating user flows, sitemaps, wireframes, prototypes and mockups
Translating requirements into style guides, design systems, design patterns and attractive user interfaces
Designing UI elements such as input controls, navigational components and informational components for mobile, desktop or web applications
Collaborating effectively with product, sales, marketing and management teams
Incorporating customer feedback, usage metrics, and usability findings into design in order to enhance user experience
Qualifications:
Pursuing a Bachelor’s or Master's degree in Computer Science, Design or relevant field
Knowledge of wireframe tools (Figma, Sketch, AdobeXD, InVision)
Some experience in design would be a huge plus (e.g. managing a social media account, photoshop, etc.)
Some familiarity with software development (i.e. basic Python, Java, etc)
Team spirit; strong communication skills to collaborate with various stakeholders
Exuding strong leadership with strong interpersonal communication skills are greatly preferable
Able to work in a fast-paced startup environment

Application Instructions
You will have a higher chance of consideration by applying for this position following the link here:

https://talenttribe.asia/jobs/kinexcs/uxui-developer-l7p3Mv
